title: No. 8 Recipe
full_text:
No. 8 Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1
ounce
ruby red grapefruit juice
3/4
ounce
The King's Ginger
1
ounce
Fidencio Sin Humo (no smoke)
Mezcal
(see note)
1
dash
orange
bitters
Orange twist
or
orange wheel
Directions
Add lime juice, grapefruit juice, King's Ginger, mezcal, and orange bitters to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass, garnish with orange twist or orange wheel and serve.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
Mezcal
